name: comraddd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: eqtrd(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2), co(c2, caddc, c1), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), co(c1, caddc, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c2, caddc, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Commute RHS addition, in deduction form. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)
